DOC.brief_summary: Fluoroquinolone one important drug treatment multidrug-resistant TB ( MDR-TB ) . Among , levofloxacin moxifloxacin use widely . However , study directly compare efficacy levofloxacin moxifloxacin among MDR-TB patient . The investigator compare efficacy levofloxacin moxifloxacin prospective multicenter randomize open label phase III trial .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effect Between Levofloxacin Moxifloxacin Among MDR-TB Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients multidrugresistant TB , sensitive levofloxacin moxifloxacin Achieved negative conversion M. TB culture enrollment Positive antiHIV antibody Pregnant woman sexually active woman without use proper birth control method Serum creatine grater 2mg/dL , urine protein great 2+ Serum total bilirubin great 2 mg/dL AST ALT great 1.5 time normal upper limit History current arrhythmia Hypersensitivity levofloxacin , moxifloxacin , rifabutin Should use drug contain metalion , warfarin , phenytoin , theophylline , probenecid regularly
